description:
Whether you meant to ride in the dark, or just got caught our after the sun called it a day, this compact light set will keep you seen. Pairing the Mini Drive 400XL front with the KTV Drive Pro rear this package sets you up for low-light commutes. Each light is tuned for maximum visibility, day or night; both lights have a brilliant option that’s easy to see in the midday sun. USB-charging means the days of “good enough” batteries can be a thing of the past.

  • Front light has 8 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 5 in flashing; steady: 400 lumens (1h), 150 lumens (2.5h), 75 lumens (5h), flash 1–50 lumens (13.5h), flash 2–50 lumens (13.5h), flash 3 – 15 lumens (20h), day flash–400 lumens (7h) and pulse–50 lumens (15h)
  • Rear light has 6 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 4 in flashing; steady: 10 lumens (9h), 50 lumens (2h), flash 1–25 lumens (18h), flash 2–5 lumens (20h), day flash – 150 lumens (10.5h) and pulse–50 lumens (4h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each light’s 2 LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Wide-angle lens that provides
  • Cut-outs at the lens of the front light provide side illumination – over 270° of visibility, keeping you seen from the side
  • Integrated USB plug means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes about 2.5 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps. Front light also has an integrated clip to mount it to a pack or a dog collar
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Mini Drive 400XL/KTV Pro Drive Light Set
